text: An athlete agent who violates § 47-2887.13 is guilty of a misdemeanor and, upon conviction, is punishable by maximum fine of $10,000 or imprisonment of 6 months, or both. Violations shall be prosecuted by the Attorney General for the District of Columbia in the name of the District of Columbia.
historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 15-354 substituted "Attorney General for the District of Columbia" for "Corporation Counsel".

Legislative History of Laws

For D.C. Law 14-107, see notes following § 47-2887.01.

For Law 15-354, see notes following § 47-340.03.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 15 of the Uniform Athlete Agents Act. See Vol. 7, Pt. I, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 47-2887.14

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Criminal penalties; prosecution by Corporation Counsel.
